name: fullstack-template
description: Full stack React + Node.js template with comprehensive Claude Code documentation

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:backend -- --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/node_modules backend/dist shared/node_modules shared/dist node_modules
